comments.body:
Maybe we could keep removed tests and, add Vavr as test-only dependency and use VavrDecorators as a glue?
We use Vavr eg. `Try` class a lot in tests...

I have added `resilience4j-vavr` module as test dependency wherever needed. Here since we moved `vavr` related decorators in `resilience4j-vavr`, I thought its better to move related tests along for the ease of visibility.
